For example, you might update a\n       record based on conditional logic:\n\n        if (vaVars.my_flag == 'say hello') {\n            gs.info('hi there');\n        } else {\n            gs.info('bye now');\n        }\n    */\n\n\n try { \n var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('ChatGPT Integration', 'ChatGTP- Get Answers');\n r.setStringParameterNoEscape('question', 'Tell me about ServiceNow');\n\n//override authentication profile \n//authentication type ='basic'/ 'oauth2'\n//r.setAuthenticationProfile(authentication type, profile name);\n\n//set a MID server name if one wants to run the message on MID\n//r.setMIDServer('MY_MID_SERVER');\n\n//if the message is configured to communicate through ECC queue, either\n//by setting a MID server or calling executeAsync, one needs to set skip_sensor\n//to true. Otherwise, one may get an intermittent error that the response body is null\n//r.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);\n\n var response = r.execute();\n var responseBody = response.getBody();\n var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();\n}\ncatch(ex) {\n var message = ex.message;\n}\n\n\n})()\n","id":"62fc96c288a34d3997b7142ac3955b41","name":"Connect To GPT","goal_id":"primary","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"}},{"type":"ScriptedAction","script":"(function execute() {\n\n    var question = vaInputs.query;\n\n    try {\n        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('ChatGPT Integration', 'ChatGTP- Get Answers');\n        r.setStringParameterNoEscape('question', question);\n\n        //override authentication profile \n        //authentication type ='basic'/ 'oauth2'\n        //r.setAuthenticationProfile(authentication type, profile name);\n\n        //set a MID server name if one wants to run the message on MID\n        //r.setMIDServer('MY_MID_SERVER');\n\n        //if the message is configured to communicate through ECC queue, either\n        //by setting a MID server or calling executeAsync, one needs to set skip_sensor\n        //to true. Otherwise, one may get an intermittent error that the response body is null\n        //r.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);\n\n        var response = r.execute();\n        var responseBody = response.getBody();\n        var parsedBody = JSON.parse(responseBody);\n        var output = parsedBody.choices[0].message.content;\n        vaVars.Outputs = output;\n    }\n    catch (ex) {\n        var message = ex.message;\n    }\n})()\n","id":"eb2e1af99c8d49c99cf6501b17d3f158","name":"Check GPT For Answers","goal_id":"primary","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"}},{"type":"TextOutputPrompt","value":[{"type":"String","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {\n    /* Return a quoted string. return gs.getMessageLang(\"how are you {0}\", vaContext.getRequesterLang(), [vaInputs.last_name]);\n       }\n    */\n    return vaVars.Outputs +'SR';\n})()\n"}],"id":"177161f7a3d342adabb4e8be674af58c","name":"Print           "script": "(function execute() {\n    /* Code your scripted action here. Otherwise, one may get an intermittent error that the response body is null\n//r.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);\n\n var response = r.execute();\n var responseBody = response.getBody();\n var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();\n}\ncatch(ex) {\n var message = ex.message;\n}\n\n\n})()\n",

          "name": "Check GPT For Answers",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n\n    var question = vaInputs.query;\n\n    try {\n        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('ChatGPT Integration', 'ChatGTP- Get Answers');\n        r.setStringParameterNoEscape('question', question);\n\n        //override authentication profile \n        //authentication type ='basic'/ 'oauth2'\n        //r.setAuthenticationProfile(authentication type, profile name);\n\n        //set a MID server name if one wants to run the message on MID\n        //r.setMIDServer('MY_MID_SERVER');\n\n        //if the message is configured to communicate through ECC queue, either\n        //by setting a MID server or calling executeAsync, one needs to set skip_sensor\n        //to true. Otherwise, one may get an intermittent error that the response body is null\n        //r.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);\n\n        var response = r.execute();\n        var responseBody = response.getBody();\n        var parsedBody = JSON.parse(responseBody);\n        var output = parsedBody.choices[0].message.content;\n        vaVars.Outputs = output;\n    }\n    catch (ex) {\n        var message = ex.message;\n    }\n})()\n",

            "mode": "query"

Otherwise, one may get an intermittent error that the response body is null\n        //r.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);\n\n        var response = r.execute();\n        var responseBody = response.getBody();\n        var parsedBody = JSON.parse(responseBody);\n        var output = parsedBody.choices[0].message.content;\n        vaVars.Outputs = output;\n    }\n    catch (ex) {\n        var message = ex.message;\n    }\n})()\n",

        "62fc96c288a34d3997b7142ac3955b41": {
          "id": "62fc96c288a34d3997b7142ac3955b41",
          "name": "Connect To GPT",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    /* Code your scripted action here. For example, you might update a\n       record based on conditional logic:\n\n        if (vaVars.my_flag == 'say hello') {\n            gs.info('hi there');\n        } else {\n            gs.info('bye now');\n        }\n    */\n\n\n try { \n var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('ChatGPT Integration', 'ChatGTP- Get Answers');\n r.setStringParameterNoEscape('question', 'Tell me about ServiceNow');\n\n//override authentication profile \n//authentication type ='basic'/ 'oauth2'\n//r.setAuthenticationProfile(authentication type, profile name);\n\n//set a MID server name if one wants to run the message on MID\n//r.setMIDServer('MY_MID_SERVER');\n\n//if the message is configured to communicate through ECC queue, either\n//by setting a MID server or calling executeAsync, one needs to set skip_sensor\n//to true. Otherwise, one may get an intermittent error that the response body is null\n//r.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);\n\n var response = r.execute();\n var responseBody = response.getBody();\n var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();\n}\ncatch(ex) {\n var message = ex.message;\n}\n\n\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "eb2e1af99c8d49c99cf6501b17d3f158": {
          "id": "eb2e1af99c8d49c99cf6501b17d3f158",
          "name": "Check GPT For Answers",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n\n    var question = vaInputs.query;\n\n    try {\n        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('ChatGPT Integration', 'ChatGTP- Get Answers');\n        r.setStringParameterNoEscape('question', question);\n\n        //override authentication profile \n        //authentication type ='basic'/ 'oauth2'\n        //r.setAuthenticationProfile(authentication type, profile name);\n\n        //set a MID server name if one wants to run the message on MID\n        //r.setMIDServer('MY_MID_SERVER');\n\n        //if the message is configured to communicate through ECC queue, either\n        //by setting a MID server or calling executeAsync, one needs to set skip_sensor\n        //to true. Otherwise, one may get an intermittent error that the response body is null\n        //r.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);\n\n        var response = r.execute();\n        var responseBody = response.getBody();\n        var parsedBody = JSON.parse(responseBody);\n        var output = parsedBody.choices[0].message.content;\n        vaVars.Outputs = output;\n    }\n    catch (ex) {\n        var message = ex.message;\n    }\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_cb_design_topic"><sys_cb_design_topic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><compiled_topic display_value="_PRVW__c132e3dbb77371104ce54e81f9130fe1">0932e3db93737110ebfe3f018bba10e6</compiled_topic><design_definition>{"type":"FlowTopic","triggers":[{"type":"Trigger","name":"e92d7cde293c47fba3c853a45bbe634f","triggerType":"request","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"},"id":"e92d7cde293c47fba3c853a45bbe634f"}],"goals":[{"name":"primary","trigger_id":"e92d7cde293c47fba3c853a45bbe634f","nodes":[{"type":"StartGoal","goal_id":"primary","greeting_msg":{"type":"String","mode":"string","value":"gs.getMessageLang(\"Please wait while we are checking the data\", vaContext.getRequesterLang())"},"id":"032f567df0ba40a1b5a909842c02cb36","name":"Start"},{"type":"TerminateGoal","goal_id":"primary","confirmation_msg":{"type":"String","mode":"string","value":""},"id":"1ff2a46339214b1a8a7e8ae87fdd82b3","name":"End"},{"type":"ScriptedAction","script":"(function execute() {\n    /* Code your scripted action here. For example, you might update a\n       record based on conditional logic:\n\n        if (vaVars.my_flag == 'say hello') {\n            gs.info('hi there');\n        } else {\n            gs.info('bye now');\n        }\n    */\n\n\n try { \n var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('ChatGPT Integration', 'ChatGTP- Get Answers');\n r.setStringParameterNoEscape('question', 'Tell me about ServiceNow');\n\n//override authentication profile \n//authentication type ='basic'/ 'oauth2'\n//r.setAuthenticationProfile(authentication type, profile name);\n\n//set a MID server name if one wants to run the message on MID\n//r.setMIDServer('MY_MID_SERVER');\n\n//if the message is configured to communicate through ECC queue, either\n//by setting a MID server or calling executeAsync, one needs to set skip_sensor\n//to true. Otherwise, one may get an intermittent error that the response body is null\n//r.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);\n\n var response = r.execute();\n var responseBody = response.getBody();\n var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();\n}\ncatch(ex) {\n var message = ex.message;\n}\n\n\n})()\n","id":"62fc96c288a34d3997b7142ac3955b41","name":"Connect To GPT","goal_id":"primary","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"}},{"type":"ScriptedAction","script":"(function execute() {\n\n    var question = vaInputs.query;\n\n    try {\n        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('ChatGPT Integration', 'ChatGTP- Get Answers');\n        r.setStringParameterNoEscape('question', question);\n\n        //override authentication profile \n        //authentication type ='basic'/ 'oauth2'\n        //r.setAuthenticationProfile(authentication type, profile name);\n\n        //set a MID server name if one wants to run the message on MID\n        //r.setMIDServer('MY_MID_SERVER');\n\n        //if the message is configured to communicate through ECC queue, either\n        //by setting a MID server or calling executeAsync, one needs to set skip_sensor\n        //to true. Otherwise, one may get an intermittent error that the response body is null\n        //r.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);\n\n        // var response = r.execute();\n        // var responseBody =
